title: The Voice of the Muse: Answering the Call to Write
description: Unleash the power of your creative potential!~ Learn practical, fun techniques guaranteed to get your stories on paper~ Weave worlds of wonder beyond your conscious imagining~ Discover how to write naturally, eloquently and powerfully without struggleWhether you're a seasoned writer or just starting out, whatever your genre or form, The Voice of the Muse will deepen your creative experience and awaken you to new skills, new stories and a renewed confidence in your innate gifts.You'll never feel the same about writing again!The words lie within you. They hover in the shadows, longing to be noticed, yearning to heard, aching to be shared. Together, through this book, you and I will give them voice.~ Mark David Gerson, "The Voice of the Muse"Winner of a Silver Medal as one of the top writing books of 2009 from the Independent Publisher Book AwardsWorks well in conjunction with The Voice of the Muse Guided Meditations for Writers , a 2-CD recording that includes the author's recording of all the guided meditations in the book and is also available on Amazon.
author: Mark David Gerson
